name: 21c Museum Hotel Louisville

reviews.text: We absolutely loved 21C! VERY clean & quiet. The art is really cool, particularly a few pieces in the bar :) Proof had great drinks & food. We will definitely return!
reviews.title: Awesome experience!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is spotless. I am always paranoid about hotel cleanliness and bugs, and neither is an issue here. The property is flawless. Also, the staff is friendly and very customer-centered. The art is edgy and cool. The food in the restaurant is delectable, and the wine is impressive. My two favorite things though are the toiletries and the luxurious robes in the rooms.
reviews.title: A fabulous place to stay!

reviews.text: I had heard about this hotel and made a point to stay at 21c on this quick weekend trip. It's a unique concept of a hotel and art museum together in one building. To say it is very hip is an understatement; I totally loved the concept. Young friendly staff; great bar and restaurant. A treat for the eyes everywhere you look. I like hotels that "think outside the box" a bit while still offering great service and comfortable rooms. it's also centrally located in downtown Louisville close restaurants and theater.
reviews.title: Hip eclectic hotel

reviews.text: Let me say that I've stayed in several hotels this year and this was an experience like no other! The room was beautiful, the lobby even more so. The art on the walls was provocative and interesting. I will say that it's not a hotel built for children, but that may have been because mine is 3.5. She did enjoy the children in the lobby (who were naked because they were art she says) and the car out front with feet underneath.
reviews.title: Fabulous hotel close to everything!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only real complaint that can even be lodged is that the room did get quite warm at night even with the thermostat set at 64 degrees. Other than that, it was simply perfect. There were chocolates left on the pillow and a fresh bottle of water every time housekeeping visited. My favorite touch was that the ice bucket would magically refill throughout the day. The whimsical nature of this hotel makes you want to keep coming back and finding more special touches. If you have a few extra dollars and an open weekend, come give the 21C a try!
reviews.title: Best place to stay in Louisville

reviews.text: Although 21c Museum Hotel is a pricey place to stay in central Louisville, it's so memorable! Two floors of awesome contemporary art, plenty of helpful staff and those red plastic penguins everywhere...we and our children will be talking about our one night stay at the 21c for years to come.
reviews.title: Cool, convenient place to stay

reviews.text: Highlights include the interactive artwork in the elevator lobby, the service at Proof on Main and the luxury amenities in the bathroom.
reviews.title: Didn't stay as a guest, visited the gallery

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is really worthwhile to go in to see this gallery, er, hotel lobby, er, art gallery. I have family in the area, so I don't need to stay at the hotel, but the art is a must-see!!!
reviews.title: The best in Louisville and one of the best in USA

reviews.text: My wife and I stayed here the first week in March and this is an incredible hotel with a museum that changes its exhibits with regularity. The restaurant is fantastic. This is the first time I ever ate the marrow from Buffalo bones (I know it sounds gross) and it was delicious. If you need to be in Lousiville, this is a MUST stay!
reviews.title: Kick back and have some bourbon

reviews.text: This is a very good place to stay, expensive for Louisville but a bargain by other standards. Have a rare bourbon in the bar downstairs while you're at it.
reviews.title: Wow!

reviews.text: Stayed one night & had a great time. Staff was friendly & helpful. The room was clean & comfortable. Linens were great & amenties were wonderful. I would highly recommend.
reviews.title: Very cool place to stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Recently stayed for romantic getaway. Absolutely stunning hotel (or museum with beds). Wish we would have had a little more time to look at everything. Rooms were exceptional, service was more than friendly. Restaurant was "different". Central location made it easily walkable to many areas - KFC Yum Center, 4th Street Live, Science Museum (across street),
reviews.title: Too much fun/Too little time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Louisville Slugger Museum. Would return without hesitation
reviews.title: Great Hotel Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is outstanding! The staff is courteous and friendly and accommodating. Everyone made us feel welcome. The rooms are contemporary and clean with flat screen hi-def TVs, bath robes and free Wi-Fi.
reviews.title: Enjoyed Our Stay

reviews.text: It doubles as a museum and has a lot of art pieces, with a docent to guide you through them.
reviews.title: So cool. Should stay at this hotel.

reviews.text: Fabulous experience! Everyone was warm and welcoming. I made a mistake and thought I booked a room with an Atrium view but the 21C customer service quickly adjusted and put me in an Atrium room without any additional charge. The room was comfortable, charming, & clean and had a wonderful vibe. The bathrooms are cozy. Service was incredible, everyone was attentive and tried to anticipate your every desire and make it possible. The restaurant is awesome. What really makes this place though is the museum and the warm staff. They pay amazing attention to detail and everyone at the the 21C aims to please.
reviews.title: The Best in the World

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Tried this hotel after seeing reviews and rankings. Compared to the chain hotels in downtown Louisville this is in a class by itself. This is a small, intimate hotel where we were treated personally with a smile. We did not partake in the amenities such as the spa, but took a quick trip through the museum and had a drink at the bar. Nothing to complain about. The rooms were nice, though nothing unique other than the exposed brick. Conde nast has this rated as a top 10 hotel in the world. I am not sure about that, but the combination of price, quality, and the uniqueness of the museum certainly make this a great place to stay in Louisville.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel in Louisville

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed one night, celebrating a birthday and going to a performance. There was nothing negative about this wonderful hotel. The staff in the hotel, the bar, and the restaurant, was very informative and attentive. The room was very clean and comfortable The bed/ linens/ amenities were excellent! We had drinks in the bar, which were a little over priced, but good. Dinner in the restaurant, The Proof, was delicious. My steak was over-cooked, so can't given it an excellent rating. Overall, extremely pleased and will come back to stay again.
reviews.title: Fantastic and Playful!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wonderful hotel, great service, nice amenities. Who cares if there is no hot tub? Try something different! Looks like a great place for a party or reception. A wedding was going on during our stay and it was a nice buzz but didn't take over every guests experience like I've seen at other hotels. The restaurant inside the hotel has great food too... the type of place you would go to even if you weren't staying there. I'll be back... hopefully sooner than later. <3 Louisville
reviews.title: Louisville Eclectic

reviews.text: I just spent a weekend at the 21C Museum Hotel for a wedding. I cannot find anything negative to say about this place, but the positives are endless. The concept is somewhat daring for a market like Louisville, but somehow they pull off a fairly prominent mix of provocative art on display by being playful with it. The movable red penguins and the two way mirror in the waterfall inspired urinal in the men's room are just two examples that come to mind.
reviews.title: Beautiful, playful, provocative 21C Museum Hotel

description: 21c Museum Hotel Louisville is more than just a place to spend the night – it's a 90-room boutique hotel, contemporary art museum, award-winning restaurant and cultural civic center nestled in the heart of Museum Row in historic downtown Louisville. With over 5000 square feet of art-filled meeting and event space, 21c guests enjoy authentic Southern hospitality and accessible luxury while exploring the work of contemporary artists in America's only museum dedicated solely to art of the 21st Century. Whether you are visiting Bourbon Country, spending a day at Churchill Downs, or hosting a lavish Southern wedding, 21c is a modern epicenter for culture, activity and artistic expression. Applauded by Travel & Leisure Magazine as "one of the most ambitious unions of art and hospitality ever undertaken," and hailed by The New York Times as "an innovative concept with strong execution and prompt and enthusiastic service," come meet the infamous Red Penguins and discover how 21c Museum Hotel Louisville is redefining the art of hospitality.
